data: `minecraft:behavior.random_breach` allows an entity to breach the surface of the water at a random interval.

data.Name: cooldown_time
data.Description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again

data.Name: interval
data.Description: A random value to determine when to randomly move somewhere. This has a 1/interval chance to choose this goal

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

data.Name: xz_dist
data.Description: Distance in blocks on ground that the mob will look for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1

data.Name: y_dist
data.Description: Distance in blocks that the mob will look up or down for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1
